name: SheepDex
intro: Decentralized liquidity centralized platform based on BNBChain
introduce: SheepDex is a base on BNB Chain decentralized liquidity concentrated platform for spot and derivatives trading. It offers Yield Farming and Transaction Rewards while allowing liquidity providers (LPs) to allocate funds within specific price ranges and provide them with transaction fee refunds if a swap occurs within that range.
